item.title: 黄金突破 4,000 美元，美国停摆为创纪录涨势火上浇油
item.description: 现货黄金价格首次攀升至每盎司 4,000 美元以上，对美国经济和政府停摆的担忧为炙热的涨势增添了新的动力。【原文：Spot gold prices climbed above $4,000 an ounce for the first time, as concerns over the US economy and a government shutdown added fresh momentum to a scorching rally.】

item.title: 新西兰央行出人意料地大幅降息后新西兰元暴跌
item.description: 在新西兰中央银行出乎市场意料地大幅降息并发出更多降息信号后，新西兰元和债券收益率下跌。【原文：New Zealand’s dollar and bond yields dropped after the central bank surprised the market with a larger-than-usual interest rate cut and signaled more reductions.】

item.title: 高市获胜，Pictet 上调日本股市，下调欧洲股市
item.description: 支持刺激政策的保守派高市真奈在执政党领导层竞选中获胜后，Pictet 资产管理公司正在增持日本股票，同时削减对欧洲的投资。【原文：Pictet Asset Management is increasing holdings of Japanese equities while cutting exposure to Europe following the victory of pro-stimulus conservative Sanae Takaichi in the ruling party leadership race.】

item.title: 新西兰央行意外大幅降息引发货币下跌
item.description: 新西兰中央银行将利率下调了 50 个基点，并表示愿意在经济难以增长的情况下进一步降息以刺激需求。当地美元下跌。【原文：New Zealand’s central bank cut interest rates by 50 basis points and said it is open to further reductions to stimulate demand as the economy struggles to grow. The local dollar fell.】

item.title: 特朗普纪念币发行商 Zanker 正在筹建数字资产财政公司
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，在唐纳德-特朗普第二次总统就职典礼前几天发行其 memecoin 的初创公司正在努力筹集至少 2 亿美元的资金，以创建一家数字资产金库公司来积累这种陷入困境的代币。【原文：The startup that issued Donald Trump’s memecoin several days before his second presidential inauguration is working to raise at least $200 million to create a digital-asset treasury company to accumulate the struggling token, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 嘉能可从澳大利亚获得 3.95 亿美元以维持冶炼厂的运营
item.description: Glencore Plc 公司表示，将从澳大利亚联邦政府和昆士兰州政府获得合计 6 亿澳元（3.95 亿美元）的资金，用于维持伊萨山铜矿冶炼厂及相关精炼厂三年的运营。【原文：Glencore Plc said it will receive a combined A$600 million ($395 million) from the Australian federal and Queensland state governments to keep its Mount Isa copper smelter and associated refinery running for another three years.】

item.title: 分析师称菲律宾比索有望在菲律宾中央银行支持下反弹
item.description: 菲律宾比索似乎将在未来几个月内反弹，分析师押注潜在的央行干预和季节性汇款流入将支撑起亚洲表现最差的货币之一。【原文：The Philippine peso looks set to rebound in the coming months, with analysts betting that potential central bank intervention and seasonal remittance inflows will prop up one of Asia’s worst-performing currencies.】

item.title: 投掷石块的暴徒伏击厄瓜多尔总统车队
item.description: 厄瓜多尔抗议者向运送总统丹尼尔-诺沃亚的车队投掷石块，抗议者对厄瓜多尔政府上月决定停止柴油补贴表示愤怒，但总统并未受到伤害。【原文：Protesters in Ecuador hurled rocks at the motorcade transporting President Daniel Noboa, angry over his government’s decision to end a diesel subsidy last month, but he was not harmed.】

item.title: 日本工资增长放缓，凸显高市面临的挑战
item.description: 日本的工资增长速度是三个月来最慢的，实际工资继续下降，这对新当选的执政党领袖佐佐江-高市（Sanae Takaichi）来说是一个挑战。【原文：Japan’s wages rose at the slowest pace in three months with real pay extending its falling streak, highlighting a challenge for newly elected ruling party leader Sanae Takaichi who has pledged to address the increase in living costs.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚通胀率超出预期，跃升至七个月高点
item.description: 哥伦比亚的通货膨胀率加速上升，达到七个月来的最高点，这为中央银行董事会中的多数人抵制降息的政治压力提供了支持。【原文：Colombian inflation accelerated to a seven-month high, bolstering the case of the majority on the central bank’s board who are resisting political pressure to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 关注美国库存和供应前景，石油走高
item.description: 在一份好坏参半的美国库存报告公布后，石油价格走高，交易商还关注了欧佩克+继续增产和美国产量扩大带来的更广泛的供应前景。【原文：Oil edged higher after a mixed US inventories report, with traders also focused on the broader outlook for supply as OPEC+ presses on with output increases and American production expands.】

item.title: 英伟达将投资马斯克的 xAI，作为 200 亿美元融资的一部分
item.description: 据知情人士透露，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）支持的人工智能初创公司xAI正在筹集比最初计划更多的资金，包括来自英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：The Elon Musk-backed artificial intelligence startup xAI is raising more financing than initially planned — including an equity investment from Nvidia Corp. — to bring its ongoing funding round to $20 billion, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 麦艾文认为阿根廷铜业投资者将渡过最近的动荡期
item.description: 罗布-麦艾文（Rob McEwen）的铜矿合资企业正在阿根廷推进一个大型项目，希望新的法律和财政稳定计划能使其免受阿根廷最近一连串动荡的影响。【原文：Rob McEwen’s copper venture is moving forward with a major project in Argentina, betting a new legal and fiscal stability program shields it from the latest spate of turmoil in the nation.】

item.title: 智囊团称，英国人必须存一辈子的钱才能致富
item.description: 一份新的报告显示，在过去的 15 年里，英国的经济不平等现象急剧恶化。【原文：Saving a lifetime’s worth of earnings still wouldn’t be enough for the average British worker to reach the ranks of the wealthy, according to a new report revealing that economic inequality in the country has dramatically worsened over the last 15 years.】

item.title: AMP 称，澳元将上涨，因为利率将提供优于美联储的溢价
item.description: 据 AMP Ltd.称，澳大利亚与美国的利率差距将在未来几个月内转为正面，随着国内资产变得更具吸引力，可能会提振本币。【原文：Australia’s interest-rate gap with the US is set to turn positive in the coming months, potentially delivering a boost to the local dollar as domestic assets become more appealing, according to AMP Ltd.】

item.title: 人工智能引发恐慌，美国停摆推动避险需求，黄金逼近 4000 美元
item.description: 由于科技股的震荡增强了投资者对避险资产的偏好，同时美国政府关门造成的数据空白阻碍了美国货币政策的前景，黄金维持在略低于每盎司4000美元的纪录附近。【原文：Gold held near a record just below $4,000 an ounce as a wobble in tech stocks reinforced investor appetite for haven assets, while the data void created by the US government shutdown impeded the outlook for US monetary policy.】

item.title: 特朗普呼吁房利、房地刺激建筑业是个 "谜
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统最近在社交媒体上发帖，呼吁抵押贷款巨头房利美（Fannie Mae）和房地美（Freddie Mac）促进住宅建设，这给本已在努力应对市场停滞和建筑成本上升的行业带来了混乱。【原文：President Donald Trump’s recent social media post calling for mortgage giants Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac to boost homebuilding is sowing confusion in an industry already grappling with a stalled market and higher construction costs.】

item.title: 华尔街陷入停滞，亚洲股市表现低迷：市场综述
item.description: 华尔街股市在连续创下历史新高后稍事喘息，亚洲股市将低迷开盘。【原文：Asian stocks are set for a sluggish open after Wall Street shares took a breather from notching a series of all-time highs.】

item.title: 安大略省教师正在回归老派私募股权投资
item.description: 安大略省教师退休金计划（Ontario Teachers' Pension Plan）的一位高级投资主管表示，该计划正在调整其部分私人投资团队的工作重点，以回归其经营公司以获取利润的本源。【原文：Ontario Teachers’ Pension Plan is refocusing part of its private investment team to return to its roots of operating companies to drive profit, according to a top investment executive.】

item.title: 诊断公司BillionToOne不顾停业申请美国IPO
item.description: BillionToOne Inc. 提交了美国首次公开募股申请，成为第二家在美国政府停摆的情况下推进上市计划的著名医疗保健公司。【原文：BillionToOne Inc. filed for a US initial public offering, becoming the second notable health-care company to advance public listing plans despite the US government shutdown.】

item.title: 日本央行上田陷入加息两难境地，高市将成为领导者
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫（Kazuo Ueda）从周四开始的五年任期的后半段可能将面临更加严峻的政治环境，因为批评加息的执政党领袖佐佐江隆一（Sanae Takaichi）获胜了。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda will likely face a tougher political environment in the second half of his five-year term starting Thursday after the ruling party leadership victory of Sanae Takaichi, a critic of interest rate increases.】

item.title: 新行长上任，泰国央行有望降息
item.description: 泰国央行新任行长威泰-拉他那空（Vitai Ratanakorn）可能会主持今年的第四次降息，旨在重振因泰铢坚挺和消费价格下跌而陷入困境的经济。【原文：New Bank of Thailand Governor Vitai Ratanakorn is likely to preside over the country’s fourth interest rate cut this year, aiming to revive an economy struggling with a strong baht and falling consumer prices.】

item.title: Thoma Bravo 在需求旺盛的情况下敲定 55 亿美元 Dayforce 贷款
item.description: 本周二，Thoma Bravo 敲定了一笔 55 亿美元的债务交易，这笔交易将为其收购人力资源软件供应商 Dayforce Inc.【原文：Thoma Bravo finalized a $5.5 billion debt deal that will help fund its pending acquisition of human-resources software provider Dayforce Inc. on Tuesday, after receiving strong investor demand to buy up the financing.】

item.title: 瑞银称信贷市场疲软暴露出日益严重的脆弱性
item.description: 上个月，整个信贷市场的发行量激增，而周一投资级市场的一个关键恐慌指数收于年内最低水平。但在表面之下，瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）的策略师们看到了裂痕的形成。【原文：Issuance boomed across credit markets last month, while a key fear gauge in the investment-grade market closed at its lowest level the year on Monday. But beneath the surface, UBS Group AG strategists see cracks forming.】

item.title: 新堡垒公司波多黎各天然气交付在争端中面临风险
item.description: 波多黎各的一名法官命令新堡垒能源公司停止使用其租用的拖船向圣胡安湾码头交货；迫使一些发电厂转而使用更昂贵、更脏的柴油。【原文：A judge in Puerto Rico ordered New Fortress Energy Inc. to stop using the tugboats it hired to make deliveries to its San Juan Bay terminal — forcing some power plants to turn to more expensive and dirtier diesel.】

item.title: 认识佐佐江-高市，有望打破日本 "玻璃天花板 "的民粹主义者
item.description:
高市真奈的领导能力对日本经济意味着什么，以及为什么一些日本人对这位即将成为日本首位女首相的女性的政治表现并不满意。【原文：

What Sanae Takaichi’s leadership could mean for Japan’s economy, and why some Japanese aren’t thrilled about the politics of the woman set to become the nation’s first female prime minister.

】

item.title: Porta Potty 公司 United Site 在谈判中获得宽限期
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Platinum Equity 支持的便携式厕所公司 United Site Services Inc. 在选择不支付部分债务利息后，正根据一项暂缓偿还协议开展业务。【原文：Platinum Equity-backed portable toilet company United Site Services Inc. is operating under a forbearance agreement after it elected to skip interest payments on some of its debt, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 富时将越南从前沿市场升级为新兴市场
item.description: 越南首次被一家主要指数编制公司列为新兴股票市场，这有可能吸引更多数十亿美元的资本流入。【原文：Vietnam received its first classification as an emerging equity market from a major index compiler, potentially attracting billions of dollars more in capital inflows.】

item.title: 乌拉圭将主要利率降至 8.25%，未来将进一步放宽政策
item.description: 乌拉圭央行意外地将基准利率下调了半个百分点，降至 8.25%，这要归功于通胀温和以及消费者价格预期下降。【原文：Uruguay’s central bank unexpectedly lowered its benchmark interest rate half a percentage point to 8.25%, thanks to tame inflation and falling consumer price expectations.】

item.title: 高盛为 21 亿美元 Versant 分拆贷款寻找买家
item.description: 据知情人士透露，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is holding early discussions with investors to gauge their interest in a roughly $2.1 billion leveraged loan tied to Comcast Corp.’s planned spinoff of Versant Media Group Inc., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】
